review: I purchased this when it was on sale to Amazon Prime members for $19. Once I got it up and running, I had full access to all my Prime content. The interface isn't as refined or smooth as that of the Apple TV, but it functions well and is easy to get up and running. I will be using it to watch Alpha House, TransParent, and anything else I discover that is only available to me through Prime. Definitely worth doing if you want to stream, have Prime, and don't have any (or very much) iTunes content.
